wobani.components.light

Class BlinnPhongPointLightComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.core.Component
      • wobani.components.light.BlinnPhongLightComponent
        • wobani.components.light.BlinnPhongPointLightComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentBase, Invalidatable

    public class BlinnPhongPointLightComponent
extends BlinnPhongLightComponent
    Basic implementation of a point light source.
    See Also:
    GameObject
